long_description: The modified aviator silhoutte of the men's Smith Townsend Sunglasses harkens to the days of freewheeling road trips and offers coverage to the max. Carbonic TLT lenses are incredibly impact-resistant and optically correct, and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB rays. Matte Black frames have Red Sol-X lenses; Impossibly Black and Matte Fatigue frames have Blackout lenses. Tortoise frames have brown lenses; Tan Crystal frames have green lenses. Auto-lock hinges. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Townsend Sunglasses fit medium profiles and offer large-area coverage.
short_description: The modified aviator silhoutte of the men's Smith Townsend Sunglasses harkens to the days of freewheeling road trips and offers coverage to the max.
